snippet: More new hedge funds started in the first quarter of this year than in any quarter since 2007, according to data from Hedge Fund Research. Some newcomers as well as industry veterans are branching out on their own.
abstract: More new hedge funds started in the first quarter of this year than in any quarter since 2007, according to data from Hedge Fund Research. Some newcomers as well as industry veterans are branching out on their own.

headline.main: New Hedge Funds Abound, Despite Tepid Industry Performance
